pkgmetadata.longdescription: Requests-OIDC=================.. inclusion-marker-do-not-removeImplements a simple API for creating a requests ``Session`` thatmanages your OIDC-discovered OAuth2 session for you.:: pip install requests-oidc.. code-block:: python from requests_oidc import make_auth_code_session from requests_oidc.plugins import OSCachedPlugin oidc_url = "https://your-oidc-provider.com/.well-known/openid-configuration" client_id = "your-app" port = 8675 scope = ["openid", "email", "profile"] plugin = OSCachedPlugin("your-app", "your-company") session = make_auth_code_session(oidc_url, client_id, port, scope, plugin=plugin).. list-table:: * -
